text: Anata gata no on'na-tachi no naka, futei o hataraita mono ni wa, anata gata no naka kara, ka no on'na-ra ni taishi 4-mei no shōnin o tate nasai. Kare-ra ga moshi kore o shōgen shitanaraba, ka no on'na-ra o uchinonaka ni kankin shi nasai. Shi ga kano on'na-ra o tsuresaru ka, arrā ga kano on'na-ra no tame,(-betsu no) michi o kime rareru made
